content: I do not have access to current news and events. however, generally, newsday's recent acquisition and partnership activity could be aimed at expanding its reach and increasing its revenue stream. this aligns with alan j. fisco's vision for the organization, which could be to grow the company and position it for long-term success amid a rapidly changing media landscape. by partnering with other media outlets or acquiring complementary businesses or technologies, newsday may be able to stay ahead of the curve and maintain its relevance in a digital age.
